languages.text: {n}Кунрад виновато улыбается.{/n} "Боюсь, мне не удастся скрыть свою информированность о том, кто вы и каково ваше происхождение, {name} — как бы я ни пытался быть вежлив в своем обращении с вами и вашими желаниями. В конце концов, быть в курсе — моя прямая обязанность. Вдобавок... то, именем какого рода вы именовали себя раньше, уже не имеет особого значения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кунрад виновато улыбается.{/n} "Боюсь, мне не удастся скрыть свою информированность о том, кто вы и каково ваше происхождение, {name} — как бы я ни пытался быть вежлив в своем обращении с вами и вашими желаниями. В конце концов, быть в курсе — моя прямая обязанность. Вдобавок... то, именем какого рода вы именовали себя раньше, уже не имеет особого значения".

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir smiles guiltily.{/n} "I am afraid I wouldn't be able to hide my familiarity with who you are and where you come from, {name}, no matter how respectful I tried to be of you and your wishes. After all, it is my primary duty to be well informed. Moreover... whatever bloodline name you used before, it no longer matters much."
languages.original_text: {n}Кунрад виновато улыбается.{/n} "Боюсь, мне не удастся скрыть свою информированность о том, кто вы и каково ваше происхождение, {name} — как бы я ни пытался быть вежлив в своем обращении с вами и вашими желаниями. В конце концов, быть в курсе — моя прямая обязанность. Вдобавок... то, именем какого рода вы именовали себя раньше, уже не имеет особого значения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir smiles guiltily.{/n} "I am afraid I wouldn't be able to hide my familiarity with who you are and where you come from, {name}, no matter how I tried to be polite with you and your wishes. After all, being aware is my direct responsibility as Master of Whispers. I have read your profile."

{n}Voigtvir smiles guiltily.{/n} "I am afraid I wouldn't be able to hide my familiarity with who you are and where you come from, {name}, no matter how I tried to be polite with you and your wishes. After all, being aware is my direct responsibility as Master of Whispers. I have read your profile."

{n}Voigtvir smiles guiltily.{/n} "I am afraid I wouldn't be able to hide my familiarity with who you are and where you come from, {name}, no matter how I tried to be polite with you and your wishes. After all, being aware is my direct responsibility. Moreover... what kind of bloodline name you called yourself before, it no longer matters much."

{n}Voigtvir smiles guiltily.{/n} "I am afraid I wouldn't be able to hide my familiarity with who you are and where you come from, {name}, no matter how respectful I tried to be of you and your wishes. After all, it is my primary duty to be well informed. Moreover... whatever bloodline name you used before, it no longer matters much."

{n}Voigtvir smiles guiltily.{/n} "I am afraid I wouldn't be able to hide my familiarity with who you are and where you come from, {name}, no matter how respectful I tried to be of you and your wishes. After all, it is my primary duty to be well informed. Moreover... whatever bloodline name you used before, it no longer matters much."

{n}Voigtvir smiles guiltily.{/n} "I am afraid I wouldn't be able to hide my familiarity with who you are and where you come from, {name}, no matter how respectful I tried to be of you and your wishes. After all, it is my primary duty to be well informed. Moreover... whatever bloodline name you used before, it no longer matters much."

languages.text: {n}维特威尔愧疚地笑了起来。{/n}“虽然我很尊重您和您的愿望，不过恐怕我很清楚您是什么人，也很清楚您来自什么地方，{name}。毕竟，熟知一切情况正是我的首要职责。此外……无论您之前都用过怎样的名字，那个名字都已经不再重要了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir smiles guiltily.{/n} "I am afraid I wouldn't be able to hide my familiarity with who you are and where you come from, {name}, no matter how respectful I tried to be of you and your wishes. After all, it is my primary duty to be well informed. Moreover... whatever bloodline name you used before, it no longer matters much."

traits.locale_text: {n}维特威尔愧疚地笑了起来。{/n}“虽然我很尊重您和您的愿望，不过恐怕我很清楚您是什么人，也很清楚您来自什么地方，{name}。毕竟，熟知一切情况正是我的首要职责。此外……无论您之前都用过怎样的名字，那个名字都已经不再重要了。”

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir te muestra una sonrisa culpable.{/n} «Me temo que no podría ocultar mi familiaridad con su persona y sus orígenes, {name}, por más respetuoso que tratara de ser con usted y sus deseos. Después de todo, mi deber principal es estar bien informado. Además... no importa a qué casa perteneciera hasta ahora; eso ya no importa».
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir smiles guiltily.{/n} "I am afraid I wouldn't be able to hide my familiarity with who you are and where you come from, {name}, no matter how respectful I tried to be of you and your wishes. After all, it is my primary duty to be well informed. Moreover... whatever bloodline name you used before, it no longer matters much."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir te muestra una sonrisa culpable.{/n} «Me temo que no podría ocultar mi familiaridad con su persona y sus orígenes, {name}, por más respetuoso que tratara de ser con usted y sus deseos. Después de todo, mi deber principal es estar bien informado. Además... no importa a qué casa perteneciera hasta ahora; eso ya no importa».

languages.text: {n}ボイトヴィルは罪悪感を持って微笑んだ。{/n}「残念ながら、あなたが誰で、どこから来たのかについては、たとえどれほど私があなたご自身とあなたの希望に敬意を払おうとしたところで、詳しく知っていることを隠すことはできないでしょう、{name}さん。とどのつまり、色々なことを知っているのが私の主な仕事ですから。それに…以前はどんな名字を使っていたとしても、それはもう大した問題ではありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir smiles guiltily.{/n} "I am afraid I wouldn't be able to hide my familiarity with who you are and where you come from, {name}, no matter how respectful I tried to be of you and your wishes. After all, it is my primary duty to be well informed. Moreover... whatever bloodline name you used before, it no longer matters much."

traits.locale_text: {n}ボイドヴィルは罪悪感を持って微笑んだ。{/n}「残念ながら、あなたが誰で、どこから来たのかについては、たとえどれほど私があなたご自身とあなたの希望に敬意を払おうとしたところで、詳しく知っていることを隠すことはできないでしょう、{name}。とどのつまり、色々なことを知っているのが私の主な仕事ですから。それに…以前はどんな名字を使っていたとしても、それはもう大した問題ではありません」
{n}ボイトヴィルは罪悪感を持って微笑んだ。{/n}「残念ながら、あなたが誰で、どこから来たのかについては、たとえどれほど私があなたご自身とあなたの希望に敬意を払おうとしたところで、詳しく知っていることを隠すことはできないでしょう、{name}さん。とどのつまり、色々なことを知っているのが私の主な仕事ですから。それに…以前はどんな名字を使っていたとしても、それはもう大した問題ではありません」

languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir smiles guiltily.{/n} "I am afraid I wouldn't be able to hide my familiarity with who you are and where you come from, , no matter how respectful I tried to be of you and your wishes. After all, it is my primary duty to be well informed. Moreover... whatever bloodline name you used before, it no longer matters much."

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir vous sourit d'un air coupable.{/n} « Malgré tout le respect que je dois à votre réserve, je crains de ne pouvoir cacher le fait que je sais qui vous êtes et d'où vous venez, {name}. Il est de mon devoir d'être bien informé, après tout. En outre... le nom prestigieux que vous avez utilisé jusqu'ici n'a plus guère d'importance. »
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir smiles guiltily.{/n} "I am afraid I wouldn't be able to hide my familiarity with who you are and where you come from, {name}, no matter how respectful I tried to be of you and your wishes. After all, it is my primary duty to be well informed. Moreover... whatever bloodline name you used before, it no longer matters much."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir vous sourit d'un air coupable.{/n} « Malgré tout le respect que je dois à votre réserve, je crains de ne pouvoir cacher le fait que je sais qui vous êtes et d'où vous venez, {name}. Il est de mon devoir d'être bien informé, après tout. En outre... le nom prestigieux que vous avez utilisé jusqu'ici n'a plus guère d'importance. »

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir lächelt schuldbewusst.{/n} "Ich fürchte, ich könnte nicht verbergen, dass ich weiß, wer Ihr seid und woher Ihr stammt, {name}, so viel Respekt ich Euch und Euren Wünschen auch entgegenbringen möchte. Schließlich ist es meine zentrale Pflicht, gut informiert zu sein. Und außerdem ... nach welcher Blutlinie Ihr Euch bisher auch benannt habt, spielt nicht länger eine Rolle."
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir smiles guiltily.{/n} "I am afraid I wouldn't be able to hide my familiarity with who you are and where you come from, {name}, no matter how respectful I tried to be of you and your wishes. After all, it is my primary duty to be well informed. Moreover... whatever bloodline name you used before, it no longer matters much."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir lächelt schuldbewusst.{/n} "Ich fürchte, ich könnte nicht verbergen, dass ich weiß, wer Ihr seid und woher Ihr stammt, {name}, so viel Respekt ich Euch und Euren Wünschen auch entgegenbringen möchte. Schließlich ist es meine zentrale Pflicht, gut informiert zu sein. Und außerdem ... nach welcher Blutlinie Ihr Euch bisher auch benannt habt, spielt nicht länger eine Rolle."

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir, suçlulukla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Size ve isteklerinize karşı ne kadar saygılı olmak istesem de kim olduğunuzun ve nereden geldiğinizin malumatım olduğunu saklayamayacağım maalesef sayın {name}. Ne de olsa istihbarat edinmek başlıca vazifem. Ayrıca... Önceden kullandığınız soy adınızın artık pek bir önemi bulunmuyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir smiles guiltily.{/n} "I am afraid I wouldn't be able to hide my familiarity with who you are and where you come from, {name}, no matter how respectful I tried to be of you and your wishes. After all, it is my primary duty to be well informed. Moreover... whatever bloodline name you used before, it no longer matters much."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir, suçlulukla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Size ve isteklerinize karşı ne kadar saygılı olmak istesem de kim olduğunuzun ve nereden geldiğinizin malumatım olduğunu saklayamayacağım maalesef sayın {name}. Ne de olsa istihbarat edinmek başlıca vazifem. Ayrıca... Önceden kullandığınız soy adınızın artık pek bir önemi bulunmuyor."
